Compact Digital Camera, 16.79 Million Total Pixels, 8 Elements in 8 Groups Lens Construction (1 ED Lens Elements), Lens Shift Vibration Reduction, Motion Detection (Still Pictures) Reduction, 12.2 m Macro Mode, Focus-area Selection (Face Priority, Auto (9-area Automatic Selection), Center, Manual (Focus Area Selected Touch Panel), Subject Tracking, Target Finding AF), Monitor (7.5 cm, Wide Screen, Anti-reflection Coating and 5-level Brightness Adjustment, Approx: 96% Horizontal and Vertical Frame Coverage (Shooting Mode), Approx: 96% Horizontal and Vertical Frame Coverage (Playback Mode), File System (DCF, Exif 2.3, DPOF and MPF Complaint), File Formats (Still Picture: JPEG 3D Images: MPO Sound Files (Voice Memo): WAV Movies: MOV (Video: H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC, Audio: AAC Stereo)), Shooting Modes (Auto, Scene (Scene Auto Selector, Portrait, Landscape, Sports, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Beach, Snow, Sunset, Dusk / Dawn, Night Landscape, Close-up, Food, Museum, Fireworks Show, Black and White Copy, Draw, Backlighting, Easy Panorama, Pet Portrait, 3D Photography), Special Effects, Smart Portrait, Continuous Shooting (Single (Default Setting), Continuous H (10 fps), Continuous (19 Images Captured Continuously Rate of 2 fps), Pre-shooting Cache (5 Frames Rate of 18 fps), Continuous H: 120 fps (50 Frames Captured Speed of 1 / 120 or Faster), Continuous H: 60 fps (25 Frames Captured Speed of 1 / 60 or Faster), BSS (Best Shot Selector), Multi-shot 16, Movie (HD 1080p (Fine) (Default Setting): 1920 x 1080 / Approx. 30 fps, HD 1080p: 1920 x 1080 / Approx. 30 fps, HD 720p: 1280 x 720 / Approx. 30 fps, HS 60 fps: 1280 x 720, HS 15 fps: 1920 x 1080, ISO Sensitivity (Standard Output Sensitivity), Exposure: Metering Mode (256-segment Matrix, Center-weighted (Digital Zoom Less than 2x), Spot (Digital Zoom 2x or More), Exposure Control: Programmed Auto Exposure and Exposure Compensation (-2.0 - .0 EV in Steps of 1 / 3 EV), Shutter (Mechanical and CMOS Electronic Shutter), Aperture (Electronically-controlled ND Filter (-2 AV) Selection, Range: 2 Steps (f/3.1 and f6.2 (W)), Self Timer (10 sec and 2 sec), Flash Control: TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes, Interface: Data Transfer Protocol (MTP, PTP), HDMI Output (Auto, 480p, 720p and 1080i), I/O Terminal: Audio / Video (A / V) Output, Digital I/O (USB), Power Sources (AC Adapter EH-62G), Charging Time (Approx. 3 hrs), Still Pictures (Approx. 160 Shots (EN-EL 19)), Movies (Actual Battery Life for Recording) x 2: HD 1080p (Fine) (1920 x 1080): Approx. 20 mins When Using EN-EL 19 HD 1080p (1920 x 1080): Approx. 20 mins When Using EN-EL 10 HD 720p (1280 x 720): Approx 25 mins When Using EN-EL 10), Tripod Socket: 1 / 4 (ISO 1222), Temperature 0° C - 40° C, 85% Humidity, Digital Zoom Magnification (4x Equivalent Angle) Approx. 1200 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format, 12x Optical Zoom in Slim, Stylish Body, 25 mm Wide-angle to 300 mm Telephoto, Lens-shift VR Image Stabilization, Back-illuminated CMOS Image Sensor, 35 mm Format Equivalent, Intelligent AF, Creative Effects, Full HD 1080p Movie Recording, Optical Zoom and Stereo Sound, Auto Composite Night Shooting, EXPEED C2 Image-processing Engine, Smart Portrait System, Scene Auto Selector, 20 Optimized Scene Modes, Subject Tracking, Eye-Fi Card Support, 3D Photography, LCD with Touch Screen Control, Ultra Compact Camera, Mount Tripod, LCD Viewfinder, Touchscreen, AE Program, Wi-Fi External Connections, Creative Exposure Modes (Back Light, Beach, Black and White Copy, Close Up, Copy, Draw, Dusk / Dawn, Easy Panorama, Fireworks Show, Food, Landscape, Museum, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Party / Indoor, Pet Portrait Portrait, Snow, Sports, Sunset, 3D Photography), Mini (Type-C) HDMI Connection, 10 fps Full-resolution Burst Mode (7 Frames), 3.1 Maximum Aperture Range Electronically Controlled ND Filter, Smart Portrait System, Scene Auto Selector, 20 Optimized Scene Modes, Subject Tracking, Eye-Fi Card Support, Auto Composite Night Shooting, Intelligent AF Control System, 10 Continuous-mode Frames / sec

NIkon Coolpix S6400 not working in Cold Countries

The specifications of the camera looks attractive.But it doesn't work well in cold countries.I brought new one in India and took some snaps,charged it well before my travel and took it to Sweden.When I tried to switch on it doesn't work.So sent back to India to check it.It started working without any repair or service.So again my colleague brought it back to Sweden but its not working now in Sweden.Worst experience with Nikon Coolpix S6400.

I purchased this cam 2 weeks ago and since then i am testing all it's features. Let me clarify, I am no Professional when it comes to shooting, so I took a little extra time and effort to get used to it's features. Pros:1. The optical zoom is awesome. 2. the vibration reduction feature is really helpful3. picture quality is excellent4. Easy panorama is fascinating.5. very Sleek model6. has a voice memo featureCons.:1. Touch is not much responsive unless stylus is used.2. Gets heated in 20 mins3. Processing of pic takes a lot of time(in case you wanna take continuous snaps)4. The paint feature is not at all useful even with the stylus.5. low battery lifeAll in All, it is a good and handy cam in this range

I had ordered it in flipkart but i got my delivery very very late. i was sad about the delay by flipkart. and finally after getting it i tested it and it is an awesome n best of it's kind cam. best touch sensitivity best zooming and best pic quality. with many and awesome effects. i would suggest this cam to anyone who has d budget range max to 15k. you cant get all the features with full HD mode in any other company cams. so its NIKON or nothing.pros-1.pic quality2.zooming3.special effects4.even 3D mode is available in this cam while other company cam doesn't offer that5. sleek enough to fit in the pocketcons-1.display become warm on little long useover all an AWESOME CAM

EXELLENT:-1080p Full HD Video12x Optical + 4x Digital ZoomAuto Focus3.0" Touch Screen Free 4GB Card ,Pouch ,Stylus,HDMI CableBAD THINGS:-:It get Hot while focusing zoom:Screen touch is single not multi but good than other cameras:Main Bad Thing is Its TOOO Small Battery which get down in 22 minutes of HD Recording.:-) BOUGHT IT IT IS THE BEST CAMERA IN THE WORLD....

i was very impressed with this camera, after i bought it from flipkart. the touch screen and compact camera attracted me greatly, but i dislike the fact that it it has no warranty, guys please be careful!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.
